025    
026    package com.softwarementors.extjs.djn.router.processor.standard;
027    
028    import com.softwarementors.extjs.djn.StringUtils;
029    import com.softwarementors.extjs.djn.router.TransferType;
030    import com.softwarementors.extjs.djn.router.processor.SuccessResponseData;
031    
032    import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
033    
034    public class StandardSuccessResponseData extends SuccessResponseData {
035      @NonNull private Long tid;
036      @NonNull private String action;
037      @NonNull private String method;
038      @NonNull private Object result;
039    
040      public  StandardSuccessResponseData( Long tid, String action, String method ) {
041        super( TransferType.RPC );
042    
043        assert tid != null;
044        assert !StringUtils.isEmpty( action );
045        assert !StringUtils.isEmpty( method );
046    
047        this.tid = tid;
048        this.action = action;
049        this.method = method;
050      }
051      
052      private /* package */ Long getTid() {
053        return this.tid;
054      }
055    
056      private /* package */ String getAction() {
057        return this.action;
058      }
059    
060      private /* package */ String getMethod() {
061        return this.method;
062      }
063    
064      @Override
065      public String getFullLogDescription() {
066        return super.getFullLogDescription() + ", Tid=" + getTid() + ", Action=" + getAction() + ", Method=" + getMethod();
067      }
068    
069      @Override
070      public Object getResult() {
071        return this.result;
072      }
073    
074      @Override
075      public void setResult(Object result) {
076        this.result = result;
077      }
078    }
